vocabularies.definition: n. a feature that ruins the perfection of something
n. a special talent or skill
v. to go on without stopping
adj. unable to be avoided
v. to combine or grow together
adj. arranged in order of time or date
adj. abrupt to the point of rudeness
v. to urge on
n. the inner side or surface of something
v. move from a higher to a lower level, typically rapidly and without control
v. to calm or comfort
adj. enough to suit your needs
adj. used just for style or impact
v. to penetrate or pass through
v. to fall down or break down
adj. frugal, stingy
n. a small container used to hold liquids
adj. extremely unpleasant
v. to stop
v. take hold of suddenly and forcibly
adj. having an end or limits
n. a time when there is an extreme lack of food
n. a ranking system
adv. completely
adj. untiring
